mapper.select: select num,email,category,nick,subject,content, likenum,readcount,reg_date,mod_date r from( select num,email,category,nick,subject,content, likenum,readcount,reg_date,mod_date,rownum r from (select * from HB_Station order by num asc) order by num asc ) where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end}
mapper.update: update HB_Station set readcount=readcount+1 where num=#{num}
mapper.insert: insert into HB_Station( num, email, category, nick, subject, content, likenum, reg_date, mod_date) values(stationseq.NEXTVAL, #{email jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{category},#{nick}, #{subject},#{content},0, #{reg_date},#{mod_date} )
